pageProps.content:
[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"AntV Infographic 内置了以下主题，并会在后续持续更新和扩展："}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["默认主题（",["$r","code",null,{"children":"default"}],"）：适用于大多数场景的信息图表主题，风格简洁大方。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["暗色主题（",["$r","code",null,{"children":"dark"}],"）：适用于暗色背景的信息图表主题，提升视觉对比度。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["手绘主题（",["$r","code",null,{"children":"hand-drawn"}],"）：采用手绘风格设计的信息图表主题，适合轻松活泼的场景。"]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["你可以通过 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-exports#get-themes","children":"getThemes"}]," 方法获取完整的内置主题列表。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["也可以通过 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-exports#get-theme","children":"getTheme"}]," 方法，根据主题 ID 获取主题的具体配置。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["需要自定义配色或风格时，可参考",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/custom-theme","children":"自定义主题"}],"进行扩展。"]}]]}]]
pageProps.contentEn:
[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"AntV Infographic has the following built-in themes, and will continue to update and expand them:"}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Default theme (",["$r","code",null,{"children":"default"}],"): An infographic theme suitable for most scenarios, with a clean and elegant style."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Dark theme (",["$r","code",null,{"children":"dark"}],"): An infographic theme suitable for dark backgrounds, improving visual contrast."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Hand-drawn theme (",["$r","code",null,{"children":"hand-drawn"}],"): An infographic theme designed in hand-drawn style, suitable for relaxed and lively scenarios."]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["You can get the complete list of built-in themes through the ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-exports#get-themes","children":"getThemes"}]," method."]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["You can also get the specific configuration of a theme based on its ID through the ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-exports#get-theme","children":"getTheme"}]," method."]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["When you need to customize colors or styles, you can refer to ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/custom-theme","children":"Custom Theme"}]," for extension."]}]]}]]
